attributes.action: Prevent the BBC bias in favour of the remain campaign in the EU referendum.
attributes.additional_details:
Please sign this petition to prevent the BBC's using their public & EU funded position to give much greater prominence to the Remain side, than those of who support the leaving the EU.
Also, when the BBC reluctantly broadcasts the view of the Leave Campaign, they are treated as dangerous xenophobes. 
In the interest of democracy, the voting public deserve the BBC to broadcast an imparticial and even view across all medias.  

“This seems to be an institutional bias, and in the interest of democracy, it must stop, urgently."
attributes.background: Both sides agree, we will be making the biggest political decision of our lives on 23rd June. The BBC have a duty to the licence payer and for the sake of democracy to broadcast an imparticial view of the debate.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The BBC Trust is responsible for investigating breaches of the BBC Charter, which include complaints about political bias.

You can get in touch with the BBC Trust using the following website:

http://www.bbc.co.uk/bbctrust/contact_us

You might also like to sign this petition, which we think is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/129470
